name: Frip and Froop's Logical Labyrinth
description:
Frip and Froop's Logical Labyrinth is a top-down action puzzle game with over 100 different puzzles, 6 different gadgets and tools and more science than you can handle*!

Vote for us on Steam Greenlight!

Features:
-Over 100 puzzles across eight courses to challenge your puzzle-solving skills!
-Gradual difficulty increases as young Froop explores the FripTech Testing Facility and beyond!
-Six different gadgets each with their own unique abilities.
-Full voice acting featuring the talents of Tyler Uslan (Gameplay First), Petros L. Ioannou (My Life as a Video Game), and Cara Rowen (PortsCenter).

*Please note: This game contains 80% science by volume. This may or may not be more than you can handle. Wayward Thoughts Interactive not responsible for science overload or any complications that may result.
